name: THE FOREST. (mobile)
description:
After an accident you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants.
Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.
Collect everything around you to craft and create useful tools. Build a shelter where the monsters can not hurt you. During the night they are much more aggressive, so it's better to hurry up the construction.
